item.title: Moving website to Hugo
item.author: yourname@example.com (yourname)
item.description: I have been toying with the idea for a while about setting up a website through Hugo.1 Why Consider One of the best things about Hugo is that the The guidance for blogdown is really useful. Below are some of my favourite features: Citations knitr::write_bib(c("rmarkdown", "knitr", "leaflet"), file = "test.bib") (Xie 2018) Embedding Live Charts For example, the leaflet (Cheng, Karambelkar, and Xie 2017) package is great for producing interactive maps.
